questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to start recycling waste to reduce landfill waste;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) if there are no such plans, why; and

questions.section: 7. GROUPED QUESTIONS FOR ORAL ANSWER (STANDING ORDER 83)
parts: (a) when the rehabilitation of the Serenje Airstrip in Serenje District will be completed;
(b) what the cause of the delay in completing the project is; and
(c) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.

questions.section: 7. GROUPED QUESTIONS FOR ORAL ANSWER (STANDING ORDER 83)
